def_en: You use indeed to confirm or agree with something that has just been said.

def_cn: (表示语气的递进)实际上,其实,确切说来
def_en: You use indeed to introduce a further comment or statement which strengthens the point you have already made.

def_cn: (位于句末修饰very或强调某词)确实,实在
def_en: You use indeed at the end of a clause to give extra force to the word 'very', or to emphasize a particular word.

def_cn: (重复问题以作强调,尤用于答案未知时)到底,究竟
def_en: You can use indeed as a way of repeating a question in order to emphasize it, especially when you do not know the answer.
